meanings.sent1: The azalea in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted an azalea in my backyard last spring.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns under the azalea.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as a blooming azalea.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the azalea filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The pink or white flower of this shrub.
meanings.sent1: She picked a delicate azalea to put in a vase.
meanings.sent2: The azalea petals fluttered in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten batted at the azalea bloom.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks blushed like a pink azalea in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The white azalea stood out against the green leaves.
